full_ts: This is papa seven alfa. The North wind and the sun were disputing which was stronger when a traveller came along wrapped in a warm cloak. They agreed that the one who first succeeded in making the traveller take his cloak off should be considered stronger than the other. Then the North wind blew as hard he could, but the more he blew the more closely did the traveller flow fold his cloak around him; and at last the North wind gave up the attempt. Then the sun shone out warmly and immediately did the traveller took off his cloak. And so the North wind was obliged to confess the sun was the stronger of the two
